content.rendered:
MAN? - The new Simon Crackers Fall Winter 2021 collection is 100% made with recycled materials and fabrics assembled through the memories and pages of Simones old family diaries.

In 2020, besides all the obvious problems, there is a quantity of unsold garments, unused materials and collections that have remained in the showroom, so I completely refused to look for and buy new fabrics and yarns outside my warehouse. I turned things upside down and destroyed them to follow a new trail saving some space in the cemetery of clothes we live in - Simone Botte, creative director of Simon Cracker 

Photo Giada Pasini

Model Lorenzo Cancelli

Visit the official website here: https://www.simoncrackermilano.com
